typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileName as string ($fileName)
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	wildcardPaths:[($fileName)]) ~> FullSource
FullSource alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		parent_id as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Load
